explains: v. （使）成熟；时机成熟，条件成熟

sentences.en: I'm waiting for the apples to ripen.
This helps to ripen new growth and makes it flower profusely.
sentences.cn: 这有助于新植物成熟并且开出繁茂的花朵。

sentences.en: They've got fruit retailing down to a fine art. You can be sure that your pears will ripen in day.
sentences.cn: 他们精于水果零售之道。你可以放心，你那些梨一天之内就会熟。
